trans-unit.source: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its zone of origin.
trans-unit.target: 決定組件是否屬於程式碼群組測試的來源地區。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"></xref> class with the zone that determines membership.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"></xref>類別與成員資格會決定的區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"></xref> for which to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"> </xref>用來測試。

trans-unit.source: The zone parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: zone 參數不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的辨識項是否符合成員資格條件。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition tests only the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員資格條件只測試<xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>辨識項物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 設定要進行測試的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的辨識項符合成員資格條件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立對等成員資格條件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 目前的成員資格條件的相同新複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>屬性不是有效<xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the zone from the specified object is equivalent to the zone contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷將區域從指定的物件是否等於目前的區域<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要比較目前的物件<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone from the specified object is equivalent to the zone contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果將區域從指定的物件相當於在目前的區域<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*> property for the current object or the specified object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>屬性目前的物件或指定的物件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*> property for the current object or the specified object is not a valid <xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>屬性目前的物件或指定的物件不是有效<xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"> </xref>。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ZoneMembershipCondition.SecurityZone*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zone for which the membership condition tests.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來測試成員資格條件的區域。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Security.SecurityZone> enumeration for a definition of specific zones.

trans-unit.target: 用來測試成員資格條件的區域。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定為無效 SecurityZone <xref href="System.Security.SecurityZone"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回成員資格條件的字串表示。
